alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Gates of the Mountains; Hill County; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 11 at 2:29AM MDT until April 12 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...The Interstate 15 Corridor north of Power, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Hill County, Western and Central Chouteau County, Cascade County below 5000ft, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap, and Gates of the Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 3 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris and damage property. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
